/* FiltPltMap.SelectFiltPltList 정수장 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PURI_AS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.PUR_NAM LIKE '%' ||#PUR_NAM#|| '%'
A.WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE#
A.GAI_NAM LIKE '%' ||#GAI_NAM#|| '%'
A.SRV_NAM LIKE '%' ||#SRV_NAM#|| '%'
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.FNS_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.FNS_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS FNS_YMD , A.PUR_NAM , A.WSR_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250058' AND DTL_CD = A.WSR_CDE ) AS WSR_NAM , A.GAI_NAM , A.SRV_NAM , A.PUR_VOL , A.PWR_VOL , A.PUR_ARA , A.SAM_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250021' AND DTL_CD = A.SAM_CDE ) AS SAM_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PURI_AS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.FNS_YMD >= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.FNS_YMD <= decode(length(#FNS_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#FNS_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.PUR_NAM LIKE '%' ||#PUR_NAM#|| '%'
A.WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE#
A.GAI_NAM LIKE '%' ||#GAI_NAM#|| '%'
A.SRV_NAM LIKE '%' ||#SRV_NAM#|| '%'
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* FiltPltMap.SelectFiltPltDtl 정수장 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , A.FNS_YMD , A.PUR_NAM , A.WSR_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250058' AND DTL_CD = A.WSR_CDE ) AS WSR_NAM , A.GAI_NAM , A.SRV_NAM , A.PUR_VOL , A.PWR_VOL , A.PUR_ARA , A.SAM_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250021' AND DTL_CD = A.SAM_CDE ) AS SAM_NAM , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PURI_AS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_PURI_AS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , FNS_YMD , PUR_NAM , WSR_CDE , GAI_NAM , SRV_NAM , PUR_VOL , PWR_VOL , PUR_ARA , SAM_CDE , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #FNS_YMD# , #PUR_NAM# , #WSR_CDE# , #GAI_NAM# , #SRV_NAM# , #PUR_VOL# , #PWR_VOL# , #PUR_ARA# , #SAM_CDE# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# )

/* 정수장 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_PURI_AS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , FNS_YMD = #FNS_YMD# , PUR_NAM = #PUR_NAM# , WSR_CDE = #WSR_CDE# , GAI_NAM = #GAI_NAM# , SRV_NAM = #SRV_NAM# , PUR_VOL = #PUR_VOL# , PWR_VOL = #PWR_VOL# , PUR_ARA = #PUR_ARA# , SAM_CDE = #SAM_CDE# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
/* 정수장 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_PURI_AS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
